DOC.brief_summary: Two hundred ninety-three college student report drink past month randomly assign condition 2 ( self-affirmation : value vs. control write task ) x 2 ( implementation intention : form vs. form ) between-subjects factorial design . Participants first complete self-affirmation control write task , read article describe risk drink . Next , participant report common drinking behavior contexts , select two harm-reduction strategy make either general intention use strategy make implementation intention use strategy . Alcohol consumption measure 1 2 week experimental session .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing College Student Drinking Integrating Self-Affirmation Implementation Intentions
DOC.criteria: Must report drink least 1 drink last 30 day time first participation .
